snippet.title: LEGO Bricktales | Announcement Trailer | 2022
snippet.description:
Demo out now on Steam! Play it over at https://s.team/a/1898290 

A new LEGO adventure from the creators of Bridge Constructor is coming in 2022. 

Sign up to the newsletter and read more about the game: http://legobricktales.com

In LEGO Bricktales travel across a diverse range of intricate and colorful diorama biomes all fully built from LEGO bricks, and get captivated by a charming story. LEGO Bricktales encourages you to unlock your creativity as you build your own solutions to the game’s many inventive puzzles.
